title: The Day After Yesterday
description: The events of a single night can change a life forever, as musician Daniel Whitman discovers when he loses his family and home.  Overwhelmed by grief, unable to find solace in his music or accept comfort from his friends, he flees up the California coast. Daniel thinks he's leaving everything behind, but his journey will take him to the places and people that will help him find his way back.  The Day After Yesterday is a story of hope, friendship, and the redemptive power of music.
author: Kelly Cozy
